law.history: Repealed 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 33. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 12. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 5. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 52, effective June 15, 1950.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Monthly payment of mileage tax; proportionate payment of seat or weight tax on vehicle beginning operation after January 1; credit for tax paid on vehicle that is burned, sold or inoperative.
